section.heading: Civil commitment proceedings; extreme risk protection orders.

para.text: Mental health information may be disclosed by a mental health professional when and to the extent necessary to:
Initiate or seek civil commitment proceedings under § 21-541; or
Request an extreme risk protection order under subchapter X of Chapter 25 of this title.
